attributes.action: Prohibit use of plastics in restaurants/cafes, including utinsils and takeaways.
attributes.additional_details:
It is eco friendly. 
It will save the government money regarding recycling and disposing of plastics. 
I will be beneficial to the generations ahead of us. 
Set an appointment example to other countries. 
Allow guilt free restaurant/cafe experience. 
Would enrich economy considering the concept of eco friendly, and easier disposal of decomposable items.
attributes.background:
Prohibit restaurants, particularly takeaways restaurants from packing food in plastic, eco friendly alternatives are available at good prices.

This must include coffee places and the lids used. 

Straws, lids, containers, bags, they all have eco friendly replacement options.
